product_name: The North Face Varius Guide Rain Jacket - Women's
long_description: Backcountry-ready, The North Face Varius Guide women's rain jacket offers fortified waterproof, breathable protection. It uses stretch fabric in key movement areas for extra durability and comfort. Made from coated 2-layer HyVent(TM) nylon and stretch HyVent for durable and comfortable protection; taffeta lining dries quickly and slips easily over layers. All seams are sealed for complete protection. Jacket features a fully adjustable, detachable hood and a brushed tricot collar lining and chin guard; jacket zips to protect chin and lower face against blustery weather. Pit vents with 2-way zippers let you quickly and easily control core temperature. Storm skirt, drawcord hem and adjustable cuffs keep out the spindrift and help seal in warmth. 2 generously sized handwarmer pockets; vertical chest pocket; inside, secure stash pocket. Zip-in integration lets you zip in compatible mid layer insulating pieces from The North Face. The North Face Varius Guide jacket has a standard fit that layers comfortably without bulkiness.
short_description: Backcountry-ready, The North Face Varius Guide women's rain jacket offers fortified waterproof, breathable protection. It uses stretch fabric in key movement areas for extra durability and comfort.
